Name: Jigoku Unko: Toripuru
About the game: Our character has a tantrum after eating spicy Adana Kebab. Then he finds himself in hell for some unknown reason. He is no longer human and is even more angry. By breaking all the obstacles in front of him, he tries to advance as far as he can without his anger killing him. Features: 2D Platform game. There are 3 characters available.
